summary: Adds a few chests to Riverwood with special gear for immersion purposes.
descriptionHtml:
This mod helps players who want a minimal extra bit of immersion into Skyrim. This mod adds a few chests for Warrior, Thief, Mage (all found at the Guardian Stones), Vampire, Assassin/Murderer, Necromancer, and Forsworn (hidden away to the side, just outside the front gates), and a randomized Citizen chest (outside of the Riverwood Trader) filled with appropriate, exceedingly low-level unique loot, along with a special book for each chest, detailing a suggested NPC-style roleplay for the primarily NPC-based contents of the chests.
It should go without saying that this is a mod for beginners or those who are new to role-play.


REQUIRES UPDATE AND SPIKE.esm
Idiocy on my part, but SPIKE.esm can be obtained from Immersive Armors. If you don\'t have the SPIKE.esm file, this WILL NOT WORK.


=CONTAINERS INCLUDE AS BELOW=
-Assassin-
Health Poison1
Health Linger 1
Worn Fur Gauntlet, Helmet
Worn Leather Boots, Armor
Assassin Book - +1H Skill
Murderer\'s Axe - Special Enchanted (can\'t disenchant) Wood Axe to do
 extra damage to Nords and Elves
Damage Health poison recipe
Muffle Spell
Staff of Firebolt

-Civilian-
Randomized Clothes with a very small chance of Hammerfell Garb
Bread loaf
Worn Iron Dagger
Healing Spell
Civilian book - +Speech Skill
Randomized Job loot- You\'ll get a bow and arrow OR a ton of baked goods OR a pickaxe and ore OR Ingredients OR wood axe and firewood
    I am open to making these all ANDs, but I didn\'t want people looting the chests and selling everything/ In theory, just save before opening the chest and reload if you want something in particular.

-Forsworn- (based on NPCs)
Forsworn book- +Sneak Skill
Worn Forsworn Armor
Conjure Flame Atronach Spell
Firebolt Spell
Flames Spell
Healing Spell
Lesser Ward Spell
(2) Worn Forsworn Swords

-Mage-
Mage book- +Enchanting Skill
A bunch of Novice-level spells from all schools. Just look in it and take what you want, none are more than Novice level
Poor Circlet - one-time-only, $20 circlet meant for enchanting
Wide-Hooded Blue Robes- one-time-only head/body robes that allow for circlets
unenchanted College boots

-Necromancer- (based on NPCs)
Necomancer robes (1 of both the head/body and just body)
Necromancer boots
Necromancer book- +Conjuration Skill
Fast Healing
Ice Spike
Reanimate Corpse
Revenant
Lesser Ward
Stoneflesh
Turn Undead

-Thief-
Fortify Pickpocket potion
Worn Leather armor set
Thief book- +Lockpicking Skill
Resist Poison recipe
knife
(20) Lockpicks

-Vampire- (based on Dawnguard Updated NPCs)
Necromancer Boots/Hooded robe
Worn Leather armor set
Worn Iron War Axe
Chill Touch spell - NPC exclusive spell - tell me if it bugs up
Vampiric Invisibility spell - NPC exclusive spell - tell me if it bugs up
Vampire Book- +Destruction Skill (for vampiric drain)
Vampire\'s Gift Potion- gives you Sanguinare Vampiris
Chain Lightning
Ice Storm
Revenant

-Warrior-
Worn Iron armor set (+ shield)
Worn Iron Greatsword
Longbow
Worn Iron dagger
(5) Iron Ingots
(5) Leather
(8) Leather strips
(20) Iron arrows
Warrior Book- +Smithing Skill
author: rylog9

files.name: RPAM X OLDER DO NOT USE
